text: You Were Never Lovelier is a 1942 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by William A. Seiter and is a remake of the 1941 Argentine movie Los martes, orqu√≠deas. It stars Fred Astaire, Rita Hayworth, Adolphe Menjou, Isobel Elsom, Leslie Brooks and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1943. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 romantic comedy movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: You Were Never Lovelier
